episode: I was hopeful to get into a good college when I got a good score on my SAT exam.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: In high school, I was hopeful to get into a good college when I got a good score on my SAT exam.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a big relief, getting a good score must have taken a weight off your shoulders.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, I thought that I did pretty good.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You must have felt really confident about your college prospects then.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I felt hopeful.  I wasn't totally confident though.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: There's always some uncertainty, but hopeful is a great feeling to have.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes. I was confidentially optimistic.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's great that you had a positive outlook, that can make a big difference.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Sorry, I meant to say I was cautiously optimistic.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That makes sense, it's natural to temper your expectations a bit.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, I had my whole future ahead of me and I was on the right path.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a really exciting time, full of possibilities and promise.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was meeting all of my targets or exceeding them.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It sounds like things were really falling into place for you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: So far, but I had a long way to go though.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Still, it's great to have momentum on your side, right?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Must have been a great feeling to be on a roll like that.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: And the good news is that I did get accepted into schools!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's amazing, all your hard work paid off!
